mapper.select: select * from topic where dificulty=#{queryCondition} limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}
select count(topic_id) from topic where dificulty=#{a}

select count(topic_id) from topic
and title like CONCAT('%',#{queryCondition},'%')

select * from topic
title like CONCAT('%',#{queryCondition},'%')
mapper.update:
update topic
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
source = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
time_limit = #{timeLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
memory_limit = #{memoryLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
accepted = #{accepted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
solved = #{solved,jdbcType=INTEGER},
submit = #{submit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
submit_user = #{submitUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dificulty = #{dificulty,jdbcType=REAL},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
input = #{input,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
output = #{output,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sample_input = #{sampleInput,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sample_output = #{sampleOutput,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hint = #{hint,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
scroe = #{scroe,jdbcType=TINYINT},
visible = #{visible,jdbcType=BIT},
spj = #{spj,jdbcType=BIT},
where topic_id = #{topicId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update topic set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_limit = #{timeLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, memory_limit = #{memoryLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, accepted = #{accepted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, solved = #{solved,jdbcType=INTEGER}, submit = #{submit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, submit_user = #{submitUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dificulty = #{dificulty,jdbcType=REAL}, scroe = #{scroe,jdbcType=TINYINT}, visible = #{visible,jdbcType=BIT}, spj = #{spj,jdbcType=BIT} where topic_id = #{topicId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
